title: if the support and adc combined have less than... 10 deaths, they should automatically get a chest
body: this would make them play smarter, and gives bot laners a toy for behaving themselves.

replies.body: shaco/teemo bot lane tower defence incoming

I personally do not have a hard time getting an S with my supporting champions. With just my first 5 uses of purchasing her, I managed to get 2 S, 2 S- and a S+ on Zyra. I do have a little bit more of an issue with my junglers but my mid laners are fine. 

Why should both the marksmen and support get a free chest if they meet this criteria? Especially seeing the one chest per champ limit per season (which is dumb enough on its own).

I truly hope you don't actually think this is a good idea. Why would they be rewarded more than anybody else? What's to stop them from hanging out in the fountain or refusing to assist in team fights so they can get a chest?

10 deaths is also not so low of a number that it's breathtaking or anything. Especially if they get a couple of kills first, a first turret, and aren't completely inept and getting caught solo mid and late game.
